quote: Jeroen joined our team as a student developer at the early dawn of Adshot. Whilst completing his bachelor of applied computer science he kept on working with us for more than 2 years. During these two years, Jeroen became an indispensable part of our team as he never ceased to amaze me with his broad skillset across different disciplines of application development as well as his motivation to continuously improve our application.
author: Axel Gekiere, co-founder, Adshot

quote: Our collaboration with Jeroen started as he and his fellow students came to do their internship at Norsepower. Jeroen worked on a challenging software development project with excellent results. Since then, we have been pleased to continue our fruitful cooperation in software development and maintenance. Jeroen has remarkable problem solving, project management, and teamwork skills.
author: Tuomas Riski, CEO, Norsepower
